archimate:Requirement.name: R3.1 Standard Enterprise Security Architecture education
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U1 As Head of Enteprise Security Architecture I want to provide a standard ESA education that people can go to to ensure consistent understanding how ESA works. U2 As Head of Enteprise Security Architecture I want to provide a standard ESA education that people can go to to raise the quality of enterprise security work U19 ESA community member improve my ESA skills to raise quality of my ESA related deliverables
